text: @PGIMER_Official #PreventiveHealthCare #CommunityOutreach #PGIMDercial👏🏼 Great initiative by PGIMER specialists! Preventive health care is key to improving health outcomes and reducing the burden on the healthcare system. It's fantastic to see doctors from different departments engaging with the community and providing educational outreach.💡 Did you know that preventive health care can also help alleviate financial strain on patients and healthcare resources? 🤔 It's true! By educating patients about disease prevention and early intervention, we can empower them to take control of their health and avoid costly medical procedures.👨‍⚕️ Kudos to the department of nephrology for taking the lead on this initiative! It's great to see doctors going above and beyond to make a difference in their communities. 💪Let's keep the momentum going! Let's work together to promote preventive health care and make it accessible to all. 🌟
